name: Bird Watch :D
description:
Made both for 1.button Jam 2022 and Bird Jam

Story:

You play as a kid and your parents are famous ornithologists (people who studies birds). During your stay in a natural reserve, you take your old camera out and the food they feed the rescued animals the to take pictures of the local fauna from your balcony.

How to play:

Controls:

Press "SPACE" to use an item on the front area.

Press "SPACE" to swap items on the back area.

Hold "SPACE" to look around.

Front area:

  • All birds appear here, use the "Camera" to take pictures of birds.
  • Glowing birds give double points

Side area:

  • Check your score (I have a best of 3029 >:D )

Back area:

  • Swap items:
    • Camera: Take pictures of birds as long as they are fully visible
    • Radio: Quits the game (One button limitation)
    • Boombox: Lower the music volume (Cycles back to full volume when fully unaudible)
    • Bird food: Atracts birds to perch on your balcony
